## Overview

The [dashboard](https://py-dashboard.streamlit.app/) visualizes US sales data using Plotly graphs. It provides insights into sales trends across different states and product categories. The repo: [LINK](https://github.com/4rnab20/Python-Dashboard) ![Dashboard](dashimg.png) \## Features - Interactive Plotly graphs for visualizing sales data. - Customizable settings to adjust the display of graphs.

## Getting Started

### Prerequisites

Make sure you have Python installed on your system. You can download Python from [here](https://www.python.org/downloads/).

### Installation

1.  Clone the repository: `bash git clone https://github.com/4rnab20/Python-Dashboard`
2.  Navigate to the project directory: `bash cd Python-Dashboard`

### Usage

1.  Run the Streamlit app: `bash streamlit run dashb.py`
2.  Open the provided URL in your web browser to access the dashboard.
